c:["$","h3",null,{"children":"密钥轮换"}]

f:["$","h2",null,{"children":"网络安全"}]

11:["$","p",null,{"children":["默认情况下，Gateway 只监听 ",["$","code",null,{"children":"127.0.0.1"}],"，这是安全的。如需远程访问："]}]
12:["$","ul",null,{"children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"使用反向代理（Nginx/Traefik）"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"启用 HTTPS"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"配置防火墙规则"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"考虑使用 Tailscale 等 VPN"}]]}]
13:["$","h3",null,{"children":"使用 Tailscale"}]
14:["$","p",null,{"children":"推荐通过 Tailscale 远程访问 Gateway："}]

16:["$","h2",null,{"children":"敏感数据"}]
17:["$","h3",null,{"children":"日志中的敏感信息"}]

1a:["$","h3",null,{"children":"记忆文件"}]
1b:["$","p",null,{"children":["记忆文件存储在 ",["$","code",null,{"children":"~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/"}],"，可能包含敏感信息："]}]

1d:["$","h2",null,{"children":"安全清单"}]
